summary: Walking the fine line between sanity and insanity, a reclusive prop maker for low-budget movies meets an alluring novice producer, as her already frail grip on reality prepares the ground for a ceaseless descent into pure madness.
cast: Asta Paredes|Nicola Fiore|Ruby Larocca|Tammy Jean|George Stover|Rich Mallery|Nicolette le Faye|Sean Murray|Cori Dials|Desiree Saetia|Matthew Garrett|Tabetha Ray|Brandy Noir|Dante Rene|Nick Decarlo|Keelan Morgan
title: Sociopathia
